section.title: Security - DRM - Watermark
section.p: The digital editions of Softwijs are not protected with DRM. And you don't need a password to read or print them. However all publications are personalized with a watermark that connects the publication to the client, but does not contain personal information.
It is allowed to make copies of a file for personal use. However it is not allowed to give files to other people or placing them on servers without permission of Softwijs.
